title: Great Company
cons: I cannot think of any cons

title: Great Internship Experience
pros: Everyone at NETSTREIT is awesome. As an intern, they made me feel so welcome and were always willing to help me learn. The work culture is great and everyone is very personable. Great team, great company.
cons: Nothing bad to say! Great group.

title: Acquisitions
pros: Great Culture, great team, strong learning opportunities
cons: I did not experience any strong cons

title: Great company to grow with
pros: Great leadership in place with group of colleagues that really care and take pride in their work. Good benefits in terms of equity and cash bonus, PTO days, 401K contribution, they pay for majority of employees medical/healthcare, maternity/paternity leave, or leave to take care of sick family member. Company and management seems to understand that people have family to go home to and that family comes first. Growing company with room for advancement. Your opinions are heard.
cons: There's no role redundancy for most people at the company, so if one person is out for a period of time, they come back to a full plate of work.

title: Toxic Work Enviornment
pros: NETSTREIT's office is in a great building and location.
cons: NETSTREIT has the most toxic work environment out of anyplace I have worked prior. Most SVP's enjoy degrading their subordinates and lack managerial skills. Work life balance varies from all extremes based on which department you are in. HR fails to maintain professionalism and will report back to SVP's any complaints made against them, which then turn into harassment toward the person who voiced concern.

title: Company Review
pros: The company is young, the employees are enthusiastic and there is a positive energy in the air.
cons: There are a few empty cubes in the main office area, but we are building and growing.

title: Internship Experience
pros: This summer I had my first internship at NETSTREIT and I have had invaluable learning experience. From day one, I had felt welcomed by everyone working here and they truly have a positive work environment. "Culture is simply a shared way of doing something with a passion." Passion is one of their core values and they really do live up to it. My internship has now come up to end however I have felt a lot more confident about the career path I am taking then when I first came to NETSTREIT. Thank You!
cons: I have had a positive experience during my internship here.
